name: Hendrix Murphy is Born
article: In approximately 1961, Hendrix Murphy - a future potential victim of Cactus Tony - is born in 'Lake Pontchartrain' (New Orleans), Louisiana.

nb_timestamp.nb: estimate is 57 years prior to an interview aired on ADPPP#S2.7

name: Cactus Tony is Convicted of Live Burial
article: Despite only having photographs and witness testimony, Cactus Tony is convicted of "ending somebody's life by way of putting them in a hole and covering them over with dirt." Don DiMello, having attended a portion of the trial, was unconvinced of Tony's guilt, convinced instead of an elaborate and complicated conspiracy by a Freemason's cabal, and pledged to free him.

name: Pasadena News Press Times-Gazette Reviews a Don DiMello Show
article: For the first and last time, the PNPTG reviews a Don DiMello production. The reviewer never published the piece, however, and disappeared immediately into a convent.

nb_timestamp.nb: estimate is 'about twenty years ago' rel. to ADPPP#S2.7

name: Bill Carter Votes for Ross Perot
article: Bill Carter votes for Ross Perot in the 1992 U.S. General Election. In subsequent years, Carter writes in Perot's name.

name: Prison Barge Riot of '79
article: Due to an electrical grid blackout, all of the doors of the Int'l Waters Prison Barge swung open, causing mass casualties and escapes.

name: Chip Gardner Debates Carol Channing During the Hollywood Honorary Mayoral Race
article: During the Hollywood Honorary Mayoral race in 2014, Mr. Gardner and Ms. Channing faced off on a number of issues presumably important to the citizens of Hollywood.

name: Try Not to Get Hit by These Hammers
article: TNTGHBTH was a Chip Gardner production, staged live on ADPPP#S1.2 in February 2014. Multiple victims were unable to avoid being, indeed, hit by hammers.

name: Don DiMello Presents 'Disneys Hansel and Gretel'
article: The show features a Gretel who suffers from both physical and mental problems - one leg 1.5' shorter than the other and she doesn't really know what's happening. The show failed to reach denouement.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is solid acc. to CBB#200 - upcoming plug

name: Don DiMello Presents 'Disneys Puff the Magic Dragon'
article: The show features a dragon comprised of five girls, the front-most of which has a homemade flamethrower rigged to her face.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is approximate acc. to CBB#304

name: Don DiMello and Cactus Tony Attend Marissa Wompler's Birthday Party
article: The show features a dragon comprised of five girls, the front-most of which has a homemade flamethrower rigged to her face.

name: Don DiMello discovers a 2 year-old child has been left behind after one of his shows at the Pasadena Fairy Tale Theatre. He keeps it.

nb_timestamp.nb: timestamp is a loose approximation - some time in 1963
